products.name: Apperio
products.title: Automated Legal Spend Management & Analytics
products.description: Apperio’s smart-analytics dashboard streamlines matter management, tracks legal spend and provides real time transparency into legal fees. Its central communications hub facilitates strong, cost-effective client relationships to  minimize invoice surprises and fee write-offs.

products.name: Clause
products.title: Connected Contracting” or, if room, “Integrate your contracts with your software tools for smarter management
products.description: Clause is an early-stage startup building a platform to execute, manage and update contracts using real time enterprise data through integration with the Internet of Things (IoT) and leveraging blockchain. Their cutting-edge infrastructure will represent the next generation of automated and data-integrated contracts for enterprise. Their public beta working groups are currently focused on supply chain, manufacturing, financial services, intellectual property, dispute resolution, venture and token sales, and technology

products.name: Libryo
products.title: Know all your laws and regulations
products.description: Libryo’s place-based software enables users to understand legal obligations in any jurisdiction, overcoming global regulatory complexity and lowering operational and legal risk. Libryo is currently focused on environmental health and safety,  social and corporate governance, and financial services. New areas of law are being added.

products.name: ProFinda
products.title: Intelligent Team & Work Management
products.description: ProFinda is a dynamic talent optimization platform that uses AI and matching technology to map all skills, knowledge, connections and expertise available across a company, providing a single view of an organization’s talent pool to surface expertise, create high performing teams and match subject matter experts to projects and clients in real time. It connects the right people to the right work at the right time to unlock the full potential of the complete workforce.

products.name: Qualmet
products.title: Increase the business value of your outside counsel
products.description: Qualmet is the legal industry’s first objective, systematic and qualitative solution to align goals and expectations between in-house and outside counsel, enabling collaboration, increased value of legal services and client satisfaction. Legal departments can assess outside counsel from the firm down to the individual level.

products.name: Ross
products.title: Exceed Expectations. Legal research powered by AI for U.S. law
products.description: ROSS streamlines the legal research process by enabling lawyers to ask their questions in natural language and receive pinpoint passages of law answering their questions; ROSS combs through millions of pages of American jurisprudence, statutes and regulations to instantly return highly relevant results and ‘learn’ from each query to further refine results, saving attorney time and client money while unearthing case law that would have gone unseen even after hours of research on traditional legal research platforms.

products.name: Firm Sense
products.title: The law firm client listening specialists
products.description: Firm Sense is a specialist consultancy founded by Slaughter and May trained, ex senior in-house lawyer and qualified business coach, Sally Dyson, to provide client relationship evaluation and advice to law firms.

products.name: DOXLY
products.title: A Nextlaw Ventures Portfolio Company
products.description: Doxly’s secure transaction management platform brings control, peace of mind, and velocity to legal transactions by centralizing checklists & reporting, tracking documents, tasks & versions and automating the entire signature management process.

products.name: FileFacets
products.title: A Nextlaw Ventures Portfolio Company
products.description:
FileFacets is an online privacy compliance and enterprise discovery platform that makes it easy for businesses to locate, process and move unstructured content from multiple sources across the enterprise. FileFacets’ Enterprise Discovery platform can be used as a revenue generation tool by law firms during the data collection phase in due diligence and to mitigate risk by shortening the time to deal close. FileFacets’ Privacy Compliance platform locates and processes Personally Identifiable Information (PII) and sensitive corporate data, ensuring sensitive information is handled appropriately and businesses are compliant with data protection laws (GDPR in the EU).

They have created a Content Analytics Dashboard for Nextlaw Network members that is available free of charge. The dashboard allows you to demo the advanced search and analytics capabilities of the FileFacets platform within your own environment and explore how you can leverage it as an internal tool or as a new revenue stream for your law firm – quickly expediting and enhancing your firm’s capabilities at early data assessment, mergers and acquisitions, as well as privacy compliance.

products.name: Hire an Esquire
products.title: The modern approach to legal staffing
products.description:
Hire an Esquire is a sophisticated, curated, on demand network of 6,000+ attorneys that support law firms with either permanent, temp or temp-to- perm needs.

As most of you know, being able to quickly and easily shift fixed costs to variable costs gives you unprecedented business control and flexibility. While this is a US offer, members seeking scalable staffing solutions in other jurisdictions are welcome to contact [info@hireanesquire.com](mailto:info@hireanesquire.com)  and they will do their best to facilitate your needs either directly or indirectly via a referral.

Hire an Esquire is offering Nextlaw Network members a 10% discount for these services through September 30, 2017.

Additionally, the companion Employee Bulletin can help you quickly identify just a few steps you can take today to reduce risks in this area. * BPG Insider Threats (click to download) * EB Insider Threat (click to download) For more information, please contact Karl Hopkins at [karl.hopkins@dentons.com](mailto:karl.hopkins@dentons.com)
